Title: Establishes a commission to study and report on the potential implementation of legislation, rules and regulations for an open internet for New Yorkers
Summary: Establishes a commission to study and report on the potential implementation of legislation, rules and regulations for an open internet for New Yorkers.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to establishing a commission to study and report on the potential implementation of legislation, rules and regulations for an open internet for New Yorkers; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
